item.title: Content Based Routing with Camel, Drools, Quarkus, Kogito, AtlasMap and Apache Kafka!
item.description: In this post I want to share with you how to implement a complete, end-to-end Content Based Routing solution using Apache Camel, AtlasMap and Quarkus as a developer platform, including: Drools DMN Engine, Kogito. Apache Kafka is used in this solution as a message broker.
